page.title: 07Gringley Primary School Cont
page.content:
{Provision of meals & milk}Pupils aged 5-7 allowed free milk daily.Each day average 30 dinners cooked on premises & about 12 bring packed lunches.
Lunch Break 12:00am-1:15pm.
{Mon.}Meatballs,carrots,cabbage, potatoes.Bread & Butter pudding. {Tues.}Chicken pie,peas,onions, potatoes. Ice Cream or fruit. {Wed.}'Beef Cobbler'(minced beef stew topped by savoury scone)green beans, mixed vegetables,potatoes.Ground rice or 'Nutties'(flapjacks). {Thurs.}Cheese Yorkshire pudding, chips,tomatoes,onions.Rhubarb Crumble & custard. {Fri.}Corned beef pastry & salad. Meringue Nests or fruit.
